article: washington - for those watching president bush defend the `` surge '' in iraq with the unk repetition with which he defended his earlier war policies , it 's easy to believe nothing 's changed in the white house : the most steadfast -lrb- to his admirers -rrb- and stubborn -lrb- to his detractors -rrb- of recent presidents is plowing forward in his own inimitable way .
abstract: bush acting to build a legacy beyond war
